jlmsplugin.name: CEO auto-assignment
jlmsplugin.author: JoomlaLMS Team
jlmsplugin.description: This plugin associates a user with the chosen CEO right after the user was added to a course. 'CEO user_id' parameter is responsible for CEO user that will be automatically associated with users after they are added to courses. To set this parameter you should find a necessary user in Joomla User Manager, memorize his ID and place it in this field.
